enWisdom: The fruit of long life is illness and senility
One who lives [a long life], loses his loved ones

Wisdom: مَنْ طَالَ عُمُرُهُ فُجِعَ بِأَعِزَّتِهِ وَأَحِبَّائِهِ
enWisdom: One whose life is long gets afflicted by [the loss of] his dear and beloved ones
One whose life is long, his tribulations become many
